title: Tuesday's ETF Movers: SIL, KRE - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Tuesday, the Silver Miners ETF ( SIL  ) is outperforming other ETFs, up about 3.3% on the day. Components of that ETF showing particular strength include shares of Endeavour Silver ( EXK  ), up about 15.5% and shares of Bear Creek Mining Corp (BCM.CA), up about 13.9% on the day.      And underperforming other ETFs today is the SPDR S&P Regional Banking ETF ( KRE  ), down about 2.7% in Tuesday afternoon trading. Among components of that ETF with the weakest showing on Tuesday were shares of Texas Capital Bancshares ( TCBI  ), lower by about 4.7%, and shares of Peapack-Gladstone Financial ( PGC  ), lower by about 4.6% on the day.  makeArticleAd();      VIDEO: Tuesday's ETF Movers: SIL, KRE
